column8: Upon Summon: its attack power is doubled for each 2-star or higher monster used as a sacrifice.
When summoned. Repeat all Summon effects triggered so far this battle.
Upon Summon: Create a copy of itself
Upon Summon: deal 10 damage to all enemy monster
Upon Summon: Increase the attack power of the monster right of it by 10
Upon Summon: Increase the health point of the monster right of it by 80
Deal 300% attack damage to all enemy monster
Choose an enemy monster. You can move its position.
Select one Spell or Weapon card. Create a copy
Increase rank by 1 and apply 5 attack power.
Clone a monster with an attack power of 1.
Summon a slime with 1 attack power and 1 health point.
